For 8-Puzzle

0 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8

0 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8

0 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8

4 2 0 8 3 5 7 6 1
0 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8

0 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8
